customersRatio.name: customersRatio
customersRatio.description: returns the leads made per each category of sales reps
customersRatio.queryString:
SELECT
            CASE
            WHEN is_renewal = TRUE THEN 'Renewal'
            ELSE 'New'
            END Type,
            COUNT(*) Percent
            FROM SALES
            WHERE MONTH(entry_date) = 1 and year(entry_date) = 2014
            GROUP BY Type
customersRatio.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT
            CASE
            WHEN is_renewal = TRUE THEN 'Renewal'
            ELSE 'New'
            END Type,
            COUNT(*) Percent
            FROM SALES
            WHERE MONTH(entry_date) = 1 and year(entry_date) = 2014
            GROUP BY Type) wmTempTable

eachRepCustomerWiseSales.name: eachRepCustomerWiseSales
eachRepCustomerWiseSales.description: returns each Representative Customer Vs Sales
eachRepCustomerWiseSales.queryString:
select c.name as CUSTOMER, sum(s.sales) as SALES from
            quotes q join leads l on q.lead_id =l.id
            join customers c on c.id = l.customer_id
            join sales s on s.quote_id = q.id
            where  q.rep_id = :id
            group by c.id
eachRepCustomerWiseSales.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select c.name as CUSTOMER, sum(s.sales) as SALES from
            quotes q join leads l on q.lead_id =l.id
            join customers c on c.id = l.customer_id
            join sales s on s.quote_id = q.id
            where  q.rep_id = :id
            group by c.id) wmTempTable

leadsByChannel.name: leadsByChannel
leadsByChannel.description: returns the leads made per each category of sales reps
leadsByChannel.queryString:
SELECT WEEK(q.entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Leads
            FROM quotes q join reps r on q.rep_id = r.id
            WHERE r.channel_type = :channel
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
leadsByChannel.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT WEEK(q.entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Leads
            FROM quotes q join reps r on q.rep_id = r.id
            WHERE r.channel_type = :channel
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week) wmTempTable

leadsCount.name: leadsCount
leadsCount.description: returns the count of leads taken over by sales reps in each channel
leadsCount.queryString:
SELECT COUNT(*) as LeadsCount
            FROM   leads l, quotes q, reps r
            WHERE q.lead_id = l.id and q.rep_id = r.id and r.channel_type = :channel
leadsCount.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT COUNT(*) as LeadsCount
            FROM   leads l, quotes q, reps r
            WHERE q.lead_id = l.id and q.rep_id = r.id and r.channel_type = :channel) wmTempTable

repsCount.name: repsCount
repsCount.description: returns the count of sales reps in each channel
repsCount.queryString:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RepsCount
            FROM  reps r
            WHERE r.channel_type = :channel
repsCount.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT COUNT(*) as RepsCount
            FROM  reps r
            WHERE r.channel_type = :channel) wmTempTable

revenueHeatMap.name: revenueHeatMap
revenueHeatMap.description: returns the revenue generated in each state in a month
revenueHeatMap.queryString:
SELECT usa.name State, sum(s.sales) Sales, count(c.id) Customers, count(l.id) Leads, count(q.id) Quotes
            FROM sales s
            JOIN quotes q ON q.id = s.quote_id
            JOIN leads l ON q.lead_id = l.id
            JOIN customers c ON l.customer_id = c.id
            JOIN states usa ON usa.id = c.state_id
            AND YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY State
revenueHeatMap.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT usa.name State, sum(s.sales) Sales, count(c.id) Customers, count(l.id) Leads, count(q.id) Quotes
            FROM sales s
            JOIN quotes q ON q.id = s.quote_id
            JOIN leads l ON q.lead_id = l.id
            JOIN customers c ON l.customer_id = c.id
            JOIN states usa ON usa.id = c.state_id
            AND YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY State) wmTempTable

salesByChannels.name: salesByChannels
salesByChannels.description: returns the sales converted per each channel
salesByChannels.queryString:
select c.name Channel, ROUND(sum(s.sales)*100/(SELECT sum(sales) FROM sales)) Percent
            FROM sales s
            inner join quotes q on q.id = s.quote_id
            inner join reps r on r.id = q.rep_id
            right outer join channels c on r.channel_type = c.id
            WHERE YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            group by Channel
salesByChannels.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select c.name Channel, ROUND(sum(s.sales)*100/(SELECT sum(sales) FROM sales)) Percent
            FROM sales s
            inner join quotes q on q.id = s.quote_id
            inner join reps r on r.id = q.rep_id
            right outer join channels c on r.channel_type = c.id
            WHERE YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            group by Channel) wmTempTable

salesByEachRep.name: salesByEachRep
salesByEachRep.description: returns the sales made by each representative
salesByEachRep.queryString:
SELECT MONTHNAME(s.entry_date) AS MONTHNAME, count(*) AS SALES
            FROM quotes q join reps r on q.rep_id = r.id
            join sales s on s.quote_id =q.id
            WHERE r.id =:id AND YEAR(s.entry_date) = YEAR(CURDATE())
            GROUP BY MONTHNAME
salesByEachRep.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT MONTHNAME(s.entry_date) AS MONTHNAME, count(*) AS SALES
            FROM quotes q join reps r on q.rep_id = r.id
            join sales s on s.quote_id =q.id
            WHERE r.id =:id AND YEAR(s.entry_date) = YEAR(CURDATE())
            GROUP BY MONTHNAME) wmTempTable

salesByReps.name: salesByReps
salesByReps.description: returns the revenue generated per each category of sales representatives
salesByReps.queryString:
select r.name Name, count(q.lead_id) Leads, sum(s.sales) Sales
            FROM leads l
            JOIN quotes q on q.lead_id = l.id
            JOIN sales s on s.quote_id = q.id
            RIGHT OUTER JOIN reps r on r.id = q.rep_id
            WHERE r.channel_type = :channel
            GROUP BY Name
            ORDER BY Sales desc, Leads desc
salesByReps.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select r.name Name, count(q.lead_id) Leads, sum(s.sales) Sales
            FROM leads l
            JOIN quotes q on q.lead_id = l.id
            JOIN sales s on s.quote_id = q.id
            RIGHT OUTER JOIN reps r on r.id = q.rep_id
            WHERE r.channel_type = :channel
            GROUP BY Name
            ORDER BY Sales desc, Leads desc) wmTempTable

salesRevenueAndCount.name: salesRevenueAndCount
salesRevenueAndCount.description: returns the total sales revenue generated & count of sales made per each category of sales reps
salesRevenueAndCount.queryString:
SELECT SUM(sales) as SalesRevenue, COUNT(sales) as TotalSales
FROM sales s,  quotes q, reps r 
WHERE s.quote_id = q.id and q.rep_id = r.id and r.channel_type = :channel
salesRevenueAndCount.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT SUM(sales) as SalesRevenue, COUNT(sales) as TotalSales
FROM sales s,  quotes q, reps r 
WHERE s.quote_id = q.id and q.rep_id = r.id and r.channel_type = :channel) wmTempTable

topTrendingProducts.name: topTrendingProducts
topTrendingProducts.description: returns the top trending products of the week
topTrendingProducts.queryString:
SELECT p.name as Product, s.sales as Sales
            FROM Products p, Sales s
            WHERE p.id = s.product_id
            AND YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            ORDER BY Sales DESC
topTrendingProducts.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT p.name as Product, s.sales as Sales
            FROM Products p, Sales s
            WHERE p.id = s.product_id
            AND YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            ORDER BY Sales DESC) wmTempTable

weeklyConverted.name: weeklyConverted
weeklyConverted.description: returns the sales converted per each week
weeklyConverted.queryString:
SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Sales
            FROM sales
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
weeklyConverted.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Sales
            FROM sales
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week) wmTempTable

weeklyFollowUps.name: weeklyFollowUps
weeklyFollowUps.description: returns the follow-ups made in a month
weeklyFollowUps.queryString:
SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS FollowUps
            FROM follow_ups
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
weeklyFollowUps.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS FollowUps
            FROM follow_ups
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week) wmTempTable

weeklyLeads.name: weeklyLeads
weeklyLeads.description: returns the leads created per each week
weeklyLeads.queryString:
SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Leads
            FROM leads
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
weeklyLeads.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Leads
            FROM leads
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week) wmTempTable

weeklyQuotes.name: weeklyQuotes
weeklyQuotes.description: returns the quotes made in a month per each week
weeklyQuotes.queryString:
SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Quotes
            FROM quotes
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
weeklyQuotes.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Quotes
            FROM quotes
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week) wmTempTable

weeklySales.name: weeklySales
weeklySales.description: returns the sales generated per each week
weeklySales.queryString:
SELECT WEEK(s.entry_date)+1 AS Week, sum(s.sales) AS Sales
            FROM sales s
            WHERE YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
weeklySales.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT WEEK(s.entry_date)+1 AS Week, sum(s.sales) AS Sales
            FROM sales s
            WHERE YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week) wmTempTable
